column5: So all those rumours are wrong....you really can fish.  lol
nice report, thanks for sharing.
Well done GCD! Nice mix a fish.  Good double header onna Catfish.  I suppose the dreggin didn't hurt things any.
Nice report.  That Crappie is a SLAB!
Nice report GCD - good to see so many different species caught in one day. Thanks 007

Looks like ya had a great variety to keep things interesting for the day.  Great report.  Hey GCD, in those last couple pics, the PFD you're wearing,  which one is that ?   It looks very similar to the Bass Pro XPS (automatic) TYPE II  that just arrived at my door a couple days age.   If so, whatta think of them ?  14 more sleeps for me too .... arriving Sunday afternoon on the 17th.
Great Report. Must be nice to fish a lake where you never know what you will be bringin in next.
Great report Bubba! See you in a couple weeks..

Sounds good.  BPS has their Father's Day sale going on and picked it up for $119 (30 bucks off).  Got one for myself and my fishing partner (Hope she likes it).     Sorry ... don't want to steal your post, but had to ask.

Good to hear that fence is almost done and that you can get back at the important stuff   .   Good report and the nudity wasn't sooo bad.  Would love to catch that variety in a single outing and congrats on the tourney entry.   One of these days I am going to try a sabiki rig (modified for Canada of course)  Ahh Lakair...think we are all starting to count the sleeps!  Bly
Where's the fish all I see is ya holding bait  J/K those spots are marked well and that 17" er is a nice one!  Good to see ya out away from the fence Glen.  Whopper
Great looking catch!  Easton
Fish and Nudity - Sweet!!!!  You just made my day G  Joey
looks like you had a great day.  that crappie looked big  cheers
Nice mix there but this full frontal nudity trend can't lead us anywhere but downhill
Thats not a bad day fishin at all Dawg....Nice hat! Joe

Great multi nudity report and shots Glen ,First the shots of the T-shirt ,\then no shirt Yuk but why did you wait until the end to put on your PFD.  I know it doubles as girdle I see it keeps the Red Neck gut in sinc  Gongrats on the double header glad to see you got away from the yard work you were due to post a report. \ MTP
Hmm...never noticed your smile....and it looks good. Thanks for smiling and trying to get something on you. And yes, nice fish !
A nice day on the water for you Glen, but in regards to you nude pics, maybe you should fish when it's cooler out.
Good stuff Glen, that's quite a variety you got there, now just bring that catching prowess up here with you would ya.  Maureen
